title: I remember radio ads for performers coming to Brogden Hall growing up. Some of these are now big name acts. Who are some of the artists that have performed at Brogden in the past?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/06/who-were-some-of-the-big-name-acts-that-performed-in-brogden-hall/
